author: Anderson Pereira

text:
(sorry for replying to an old comment)

Wait, there are people who don't like this game because it's not a Mario game? Lol, yeah, 'cause Yoshi being the reason Mario even survived long enough to be a hero isn't important at all, right?

And what's this about people whining about Mario's cry being annoying? Lol, then learn to not suck at the game and get hit all the time.

The game's amazing, as far as I'm concerned. One of the things that stands out the most in my childhood.

author: SilverAxe13

text:
I feel like Yoshi's island gets a bum rap alot of times from people who complain that "its not a Mario game" or "Baby Mario is annoying".

This game has an AMAZING soundtrack, particularily the opening cutscene and the end theme, the gameplay is fun, tricky, but fair (except for the special levels) I honestly think its one of the best Mario games out there. Out of all the games I played as a child, NONE of them take me back like this one does, it really brings out the kid in you.
